headline.print_headline: No Longer Lonely, a Birthday Boy Plays at His Party
headline.seo: David Del Tredici and Courtenay Budd at Symphony Space
headline.main: No Longer Lonely, a Birthday Boy Plays at His Party

docs.snippet: The iconoclastic composer David Del Tredici and the soprano Courtenay Budd celebrated his 75th birthday by performing two of his sometimes baffling works at Symphony Space....
docs.abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert tribute to contemporary music composer David Del Tredici, who performed his own works on piano with accompaniment by coloratura soprano Courtenay Budd, at Symphony Space.
docs.lead_paragraph: The iconoclastic composer David Del Tredici and the soprano Courtenay Budd celebrated his 75th birthday by performing two of his sometimes baffling works at Symphony Space.

headline.print_headline: In Hong Kong’s Elections, Some See Enviable Openness
headline.seo: In Hong Kong Vote, Some Chinese See Enviable Openness
headline.main: In Hong Kong Elections, Some Chinese See Enviable Openness

docs.snippet: The three candidates to become the next chief executive of Hong Kong engaged in a vituperative debate in an election that is being closely followed in mainland China....
docs.abstract: Hong Kong chief executive candidates Leung Chun-ying, Henry Tang and Albert Ho engage in live television debate; all three candidates are vying to outdo one another in allowing greater democracy in Hong Kong, as way to increase their standings in polls of general public.
docs.lead_paragraph: The three candidates to become the next chief executive of Hong Kong engaged in a vituperative debate in an election that is being closely followed in mainland China.

docs.snippet: The men were all killed by a gunman on a motorcycle, and apparently with the same weapon....
docs.abstract: Investigators in France search for suspected serial killer, who, in two separate attacks, opened fire on French paratroopers, killing two and critically injuring another.
docs.lead_paragraph: The men were all killed by a gunman on a motorcycle, and apparently with the same weapon.
